name: Run Fish Run
description:
The running expert fish hero is back and he welcomes you to the world of fish running!

• Awesome colorful graphics in 3D cartoon style,
• Collect the coins and increase the score: more score you will earn you will get to unlock new fish character and other exciting fun items,
• Pick your favorite fish, shark, dolphin, whale, piranha and more..
• Unlock achievements, get prizes, cups, and more,
• There are 6 power ups for making your gameplay livelier, invincible, and triumphant,
• Explore and conquer dangerous regions full of traps, angry crocodiles, and hungry piranhas,
• Create your own unique underworld with 60 beautiful sea plants and animals,
• Access leaderboard and check how other players are playing
• Stimulating music will keep your running stamina high and unperturbed!

How to play the game!
The game play is based on endless running frenzy of the hero Fish on the 3-lane water track. You have to help the fish hero to run, dash, dodge and jump obstacles, collect coins from the running track, and to stay safe from naughty enemies like grumpy hippo, hungry crocodile, angry bird, attacking machines, grouchy boats, etc.
More distance the fish covers and more coins he collect, will decide your performance level and score in your account. More coins you will have in your score will allow purchasing attractive items for making your aqua world customized.
